text-muted.description: Deprecated: Use text-secondary instead. Muted text for low emphasis

text-primary-muted.description: Primary text slightly muted - between primary and secondary emphasis

text-primary-inverted.description: Inverted primary text for high emphasis on dark backgrounds

border.description: Primary border for structural dividers and prominent elements

border-subtle.description: Subtle border for interactive controls, form inputs, and secondary UI elements

primary.description: Primary brand color for buttons, links, and key UI elements

primary-rgb.description: Primary brand color (RGB format for alpha channel support)

primary-border.description: Light border color that complements primary

primary-dark.description: Darker shade of primary for hover states

secondary.description: Secondary gray color for less prominent elements

secondary-dark.description: Darker shade of secondary for hover states

danger-rgb.description: Error and danger state color (RGB format for alpha channel support)

danger.description: Error and danger state color (hex format)

danger-dark.description: Darker shade of danger for hover states

error-text.description: Error text that's setup for contrast in light and dark modes.

warning-rgb.description: Warning state color (RGB format for alpha channel support)

warning-dark.description: Darker shade of warning for hover states

success-rgb.description: Success state color (RGB format for alpha channel support)

success-dark.description: Darker shade of success for hover states

info.description: Info state color for informational messages

info-dark.description: Darker shade of info for hover states

focus.description: Blue focus ring color for accessibility (RGB format for alpha channel support)

focus-dark.description: Lighter blue focus ring color for dark mode accessibility

rating-filled-secondary.description: Secondary variant filled star for light mode
